definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: Through the grass came a soft silvery tinkling.
sentences.chinese: 从草海中传来了一阵微弱的银叮铃声。

sentences.english: The water depth in the dredged area and the volume of the lake were increased.
sentences.chinese: 疏浚区水深增加，湖容扩大，提高了草海的调蓄能力。

sentences.english: Caohao is at high eutrophication level and the pollution is obviously more serious than the outer lakes.
sentences.chinese: 草海处于重度富营养状态，污染程度明显重于外海。

sentences.english: "I am the blood of the dragon, " she told the grass, aloud.
sentences.chinese: “我乃真龙血脉，”她向着草海，大声说道。

definition: (bird species of China) black-necked crane (Grus nigricollis)
(bird species of China) black-headed gull (Chroicocephalus ridibundus)
Stone Forest, notable set of limestone formations in Yunnan
Cangshan county in Linyi 臨沂|临沂[Lin2 yi2], Shandong
Mt Yulong or Jade dragon in Lijiang 麗江|丽江, northwest Yunnan
Nujiang river of south Tibet and northwest Yunnan, the upper reaches of Salween river 薩爾溫江|萨尔温江, forming border of Myanmar and Thailand
Lake Mibgai Co or Miga Tso, in Dartsendo or Kangding 康定[Kang1 ding4], Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture, Sichuan
